channel.title: [RELEASE] Hook Blade
channel.description:
Damn, its been a while since I've actually released something. Anyways, here it is (oh yeah, its kinda ugly too. It really didn't come out how I wanted it to, but it looks decent enough in game). [img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/8429/26882655.png[/img] [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/5512/28209788.png[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/3371/77674083.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/7751/89944466.png[/img] How it looks ingame: [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/1151/wield.png[/img] Document Info + Wireframe: [img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/3346/76740194.png[/img]
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?wvcpwa2182elazp Class8 Ints and ItemDef ints are included. If you need to use the .DAT file, simply unzip the files 10015 and 10016 and rename them accordingly.
Enjoy guys

dude you have basicly took the sickle of runescape and drawn a red line down it
tbh I could have done that
^that is an insult have you seen my models?^
[/quote]
What models, the ones you fucking took from Jagex? You haven’t modeled shit, idiot. You take some integers and fuck with them. That’s not modeling, so fuck off.

Have you seen his other models?

Now please, go eat an entire crate of dicks.[/quote]

Wtf u going on about?
I don’t make models but I’m saying I could easily make that
You sir can smd

item.title: [RELEASE] Hook Blade
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Very clean Rip, already said, but, I would suggest changing the color scheme up a little bit too, and widening / thickening the blade. A blade might look rediculously thick in Metaseq, but, in game it will look a lot better. Keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Hook Blade

item.description:

Don’t triangle it before posting then
[/quote]I forgot about it :c I wanted to see if I remembered how to add into a server, and before I made renders I was like “owait. these are triangles. crap.”[/quote]Oh well onto the actually rating, 6/10, I don’t really like the colors, the blade looks like it would break if used o.o not really set right with the handle etc. But other then that you’re still a 11/10!

item.title: [RELEASE] Hook Blade
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

How would a deeper red look for the blade and a darker orange for the handle? Thats what my original concept was, but I guess I messed up the colors a bit when creating it And I’ll try to make the blade thicker. It was supposed to be originally, but it looked bad, so I went with the thin look.

And I didn’t trace :c I manipulated primitives, and I see that face you’re talking about, its just a stupid triangle

Read full topic
